summary: This function throws the exception that it is given as an argument.
returns: This function does not return, because the exception is thrown.
throws: in order to be capable of throwing any type of exception.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val t = new RuntimeException(); %0A%0A    try%0A    {%0A        F::raise(t);%0A%0A        F::println(%22The exception was not thrown.%22);%0A    }%0A    catch(ex : RuntimeException)%0A    {%0A        F::println(%22The exception was thrown.%22);%0A    }%0A}
